title: Ambient Video Game Music - Outskirts
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting harmony of nature and city with our unique collection of 10 ambient sound packs.
longDescription:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting harmony of nature and city with our unique collection of 10 ambient sound packs. The symphony of sounds in this collection is carefully crafted to transport you to the outskirts of a bustling metropolis, where the urban energy subtly gives way to the tranquil hush of the countryside.


Indulge in the melodious serenade of birds as their dawn chorus signals the awakening of a new day. Let the gentle, rhythmic patter of raindrops be your cocoon, enveloping you in a soothing blanket of calm and serenity. From the comforting coos of birds to the pitter-patter of summer rain on rooftops, each sound will tickle your senses and help you find peace amid the chaos.


Yet, the magic of this collection lies in its adept interweaving of the city's dynamic pulse. Listen to the occasional hum of a car passing by, a gentle reminder of the urban life at a comforting distance. This unexpected blend of city and nature sounds will pull you into an immersive soundscape that expertly captures the intersection of two worlds.


Our ambience packs are perfect for relaxation, meditation, background noise for work or study, or simply setting a mood for any environment. Explore the curated sounds and experience the captivating juxtaposition between city life and the peace of nature. Each pack offers a unique escape, a personal sanctuary, that lets you step away from the stress and into a soothing haven of sound.


Invite tranquillity into your space and discover the therapeutic effect of our meticulously designed ambience packs - your sonic bridge to serenity on the outskirts of the city.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
